name: Undivided Heart
description: When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses Frostflake Arrow: Cryo DMG dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby instead.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1101], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11013]</color>: $[K101] dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby instead.
descriptionreplaced: When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frostflake Arrow</color>: {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby instead.
